body.name: NEXBOOM iPhone Tripod - 66" [Stable & Tall] iPhone Tripod Stand with Remote, Tripod for iPhone Compatible with iPhone 15 Pro Max 14 13 Plus,Samsung S22/ Camera/GoPro/Video Recording
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 13 hrs 52 mins
FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 2024 NEWEST PROFESSIONAL PHONE TRIPOD, LET YOU ENJOY TOP-QUALITY STABLE PHOTOGRAPHY.

[MORE WINDPROOF & SIMPLER OPERATION] Upgraded Phone Tripod With Three Legs Wider And Thicker For Greater Stability, Wind, And Shock Resistance. Easily Expand From 21" To 66" With An Improved Quick Flip Lock To Fit Your Desired Height. 360° Rotating Phone Stand And 180° Neck Rotation Make This Phone Tripod Can Easy To Find The Best And Beautiful Shooting Angle.

[VALUE TRIPOD SET] All-In-1 Phone Tripod Stand With Remote, This Phone Tripod Brings The Best Photography For Multi-Scene Applications, Such As Zoom Meeting, Selfies, Family Photos, Travel Photos, Live Streaming, And Recording Videos. Lightweight And Portable, You Can Take It With You, Travel, Outdoor Sports, And Record Different Wonderful Moments For You.

[TRAVEL PORTABLE TRIPOD WITH REMOTE] Phone Tripod With Remote Control Allows You To Take Photos Or Videos Easily Away From Your Phone Or Camera. The Max Distance Is About 10m(30ft). You Don't Need To Ask Anyone To Help You And Your Family To Take Photos When You Go Out On Vacation. Record Exciting Moments Anytime, Anywhere.

[WIDE COMPATIBILITY] The Phone Tripod Stand Has A Stable Cell Phone Holder, Which Is Fully Compatible With All 4.7"-6.8" Smartphones, Even With Bulky Cases, Such As iPhone 15 Pro Max / 15 Pro / 15 Plus / 15 / iPhone 14 Pro Max / 14 Pro / 14 Plus / 14 / 13 / 13 Pro / 13 Pro Max / 12 Pro Max / 11 Pro Xs Max Xr X 8 Plus, Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra S21 Ultra S20 Note 20, Etc. Mounted On The Top Of The Stand With Universal 1 /4" Screws. Can Be Connected To Most Digital Cameras, Sports Cameras, Webcams, Gopro, And Camcorders.

[Service Support] NEXBOOM Insists On Making High-Quality Products And Always Puts The Customer Experience First, All With The Consumer In Mind. If You Have Any Usage Problems Or Product Suggestions, Please Feel Free To Send Us An Email, Our Professional Team Will Reply And Help You Solve The Problem!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Have Fun with NEXMEE Versatile 66-inch Phone Tripod! Easy To Use, Durable Construction, Incredible Long Length, Together With Some Fantastic Accessories, This Tripod Set Features Everything You Need To Level Up The Quality Of Your Photos And Videos!

Not Only Want To Take Photos But Also Want To Take Great Stable Photos/Videos While Freeing Your Hands? NEXMEE PHONE TRIPOD Perfect For Selfies, Group Photos, Adventure Travel, Video Blogs, Youtube Videos, Podcasts, Facebook Live, Face Time, Instagram, Live Streaming.
This Tall And Portable Tripod Can Easily Expand From 21" To 66" With An Improved Quick Flip Lock To Meet Your Various Indoor And Outdoor Photography Needs.
With 0-180 Degree Tilt Direction And 0-360 Degree Pan Direction, You Can Shoot Freely Without Any Angle Limitation.

Why NEXBOOM Phone Tripod? Universal 1 /4" Screws: Can Be Connected To Most Digital Cameras, Sports Cameras, Webcams, Gopro, And Camcorders.Multi-Angle For More Possibility: 180° Neck Rotation & 360° Head Rotation For Multi-Angle Shooting.Quick Flip Locks: Lock And Release Just In Seconds-Easy To Adjust The Height And Holds Your Device Securely Meanwhile.Base Non-Slip: An Upgraded Non-Slip Base Can Help You Capture Every Precious Moment Even On Smooth Floors And Glass Tabletops.Upgraded Three Wider Legs And Thicker:For Greater Stability, Wind, And Shock Resistance. 10 Times Longer Life.

Compatible with all 4.7"-6.8" Smartphones iPhone: iPhone 14 / 14 Plus / 14 Pro / 14 Pro Max /iPhone 13 / 13 Mini / 13 Pro / 13 Pro Max / iPhone 12 / 12 Mini / 12 Pro / 12 Pro Max / 11 / 11 Pro / 11 Pro Max / 8 Plus / 8 / X / XS Max / XS / XR / 7 Plus / 7 / 6s / SE,Samsung: Samsung Galaxy S22 / S22+ / S22 Ultra/Samsung Galaxy S21 / S21+ / S21 Ultra/Samsung Galaxy S20 / S20+ / S20 Ultra / S10+ / S10 / S10e / S9+ / S9 / S8+ / S8 / S7 Edge / Note 20 / Note 10 / Note 9 / Note 8,LG: LG G8 G7 ThinQ / G6+ / V50 V40 ThinQ / V30 / Stylo 4 / Optimus,Google: Google Pixel 4 / 4XL / 3 / 3XL / 2 / 2XL / XL, Nexus 6P / 6 / 7 / 5X,OnePlus: Oneplus 7 Pro / 6T / 6 / 5T / 5 / X, Moto G7 / Z3, Nokia 7.1 / 6.1, etc. Package Includes 1* Phone Tripod (Can be used as a selfie stick)1* Universal Phone Clip1* Wireless Remote Control1* Customer Guidebook

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tripod to go
reviews.reviewText: Used for taking photo remotely with the included Bluetooth shutter control. The tripod is well made and sturdy yet lightweight with excellent adjustability for height as well as jaws to hold any hand held phone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly as advertised!
reviews.reviewText: Easily set up and used! Perfect for my family photos and now I’m in them, too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Product and very light
reviews.reviewText: Ok this actually is very nice and well put together, the only thing and the reason why my over all rating is a 4 and not a 5 star is that there is no swivel head or any way of turning one of the support arms.You have to turn the hole stand to get your camera in position and if the wind is blowing in a direction that you don't have an actual leg to give proper resistance on this stand to prevent it from being blown over you have no choice but to choose a different spot to take pictures or to record video.I am glad I have a different stand for my actual camera for outdoor conditions that might have wind as I wouldn't trust my $800.00 Canon camera on this stand if there was any wind outside, but other then that I really do like this stand.The holder for the phone is great, it actually has a very firm grip on my phone, and it is very light weight so great for doing selfies and even doing videos while you are walking and holding onto this stand as a selfie wand. I would suggest this for anyone and even would buy it again if ever I needed another one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use!
reviews.reviewText: It was easy to sync my phone and to set up the tripod. I love that there is a remote! No more setting the timer on the phone camera and rushing back to get in the picture before the timer goes off! I had ordered one before Thanksgiving for myself and then I have ordered several more for Christmas presents!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very sturdy and very easy to use
reviews.reviewText: It doesn't work very well as a selfie stick but I manage. It does however work great on the tripod, very sturdy and holds the phone 100% better than some of the others I've tried.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this item because my band is playing a big event and I want to take quality videos that I can put onto our website. I own an Olmpus Stylus camera which is no longer made so I was concerned that it might not fit onto the tripod screw. It fit perfectly and I love the product.,However I am confused about 1 thing.It is advertised as an iphone tripod and I intended to use both my camera and my iphone but there was no where on the tripod to secure my phone. I had to go back onto Amazon and order a separate Iphone holder accessory that screws into the top of the tripod. Perhaps if I had known that to be the case I might have chosen a tripod that met all of my needs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars JUSTO LO QUE NECESITABA
reviews.reviewText: Tengo un Canal en YouTube, en el que hago videos dedicados a la promoción de un Artista Internacional de Primer Nivel, y hace tiempo tenía la idea de hacerlos en exteriores: hoy puedo hacerlos, gracias al equipo adquirido que me lo permite.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works good except…
reviews.reviewText: Works good and as described. The remote is nice and easy to pair to our phones via Bluetooth. The telescoping feature works great. The feet deploy and fold in easily. My only complaint is the feet don’t spread very far apart therefore it’s not very stable when a phone is attached and is telescoped to its tallest. We had it set up to take a photo of my wife and I and a gust of wind blew it over cracking my phone (thankfully it was only the screen saver).Should only be used on a flat surface in very calm conditions.
